divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work on Route 84, was about a mile from exit 19. When aball of light flashed over the right side of my car,it was traveling in astraight line and was moving faster than any plane I know of. Then it justdisappeared,poof. I wonder if any of the other drivers saw this
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Patterson
There were no other sightings in Patterson on or around December 1st 2003
